companyName: Global X Robotics & Artificial Intelligence ETF
description: The fund invests at least 80% of its total assets in the securities of the underlying index. The underlying index is designed to provide exposure to exchange-listed companies in developed markets that are involved in the development of robotics and/or artificial intelligence as defined by Indxx, the provider of the underlying index. The fund is non-diversified.
description_en: The fund invests at least 80% of its total assets in the securities of the underlying index. The underlying index is designed to provide exposure to exchange-listed companies in developed markets that are involved in the development of robotics and/or artificial intelligence as defined by Indxx, the provider of the underlying index. The fund is non-diversified.
description_uk: Фонд інвестує не менше 80% своїх активів у цінні папери базового індексу. Базовий індекс призначений для надання інформації компаніям, що зареєстровані на біржах, на розвинених ринках, які займаються розробкою робототехніки та/або штучного інтелекту, як це визначено Indxx, постачальником базового індексу. Фонд є недиверсифікованим.
